title: High prevalence of anemia among pregnant women
description: In 2019, 59% of pregnant women in Mali were affected by anemia, indicating a significant public health concern.

title: High belief in justification of domestic violence
description: In 2018, 68.5% of women in Mali believed a husband is justified in beating his wife if she argues with him, and 62.8% believed it is justified if she refuses sex.

title: Low political stability
description: In 2023, Mali ranked very low in political stability, with a percentile rank of 2.84 in the upper bound of the 90% confidence interval.

title: Low percentage of women making informed reproductive decisions
description: In 2018, only 5.3% of women aged 15-49 in Mali made their own informed decisions regarding sexual relations, contraceptive use, and reproductive health care.
